~$ cat main.c  
#include <stdio.h>

void deepdark()
{
    printf("deepdark\n");
}

void unhappy()
{   
    printf("unhappy\n");
    deepdark();
}

void happy()
{
    int i = 5;
    printf("happyi %d\n", i);
    unhappy();
}

int main()
{
    printf("this is a gdb test program\n");
    happy();
    return 0;
}

[Unit]
Description=Create some managed(sta) interface

[Service]
Type=oneshot

RemainAfterExit=yes

[Install]
WantedBy=multi-user.target
